text: To Save Her Soul is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithTo Save Her SoulPaolo Cherchi Usai. The Griffith Project, Volume 11 and stars Arthur V. Johnson, Mary Pickford, and W. Chrystie Miller. ==Actors== * Arthur V. Johnson - Paul Redmond * Mary Pickford - Agnes Hailey * W. Chrystie Miller - Church Organist * George Nichols - Manager * Kate Bruce - Housekeeper * Linda Arvidson - In Audience * William Beaudine * Charles Craig - Bumpkin * Frank Evans - Stage Manager ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: To Save Her Soul
